title: Where My Bundles At?!
body: When are you going to post the bundles for December? The month is about to end and still no sign of them.

replies.body:
I don't see any official announcements for Bundles in December. It's likely there aren't any normal scheduled sales due to the Snowdown Event still going on. Keep an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) for any further sales announcements, though.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QErERcB2,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-29T23:15:47.453+0000)
>
> I don't see any official announcements for Bundles in December. It's likely there aren't any normal scheduled sales due to the Snowdown Event still going on. Keep an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) for any further sales announcements, though.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

That was my only question. I've been checking the news section update every day. I thought they were late because Rioters were celebrating Xmas but looks like no bundles for December.

Thanks for the response.
